name: Merax 12FT Climbing Dome with Hammock, Outdoor Geometric Dome Climber Play Center for Kids 3-10 Supporting 1000 lbs, Easy Assembly Jungle Gym
short_description: Climbing Dome with Hammock - The 12FT climbing dome with play mat will surely stand out as the "place to be" in your backyard or neighborhood. The pentagon play mat secured to the frame is perfect for kids to rest, read, or play games.

Easy Assembly & Maintenance - Comes with detailed user manual in color, the dome climber can be easily assembled by two people without fuss. Galvanized steel and colorful powder coating ensures additional weather & rust protection for outdoor use. The climbing dome is also lightweight enough to transport around the backyard or playground.

Safety Rules When It Comes to Kids - Made of quality materials that withstand the test of time, this 12ft dome climber with hammock has been built with the safety of your child as our highest priority. Safety comprehensively tested to meet or exceed U.S. ASTM standards.

The climbing dome encourages muscular development as children climb and hang from the bars on this cool jungle gym! Inspiring imagination and creativity as games can be played underneath the dome as well.

Sturdy Structure - Measuring 12ft in diameter and 5.9ft in height, the sturdy metal dome structure allows for multiple kids to climb all over and around at the same time, supporting up to 1000lbs in total, with a maximum single user weight of 100lbs. Adult supervision recommended.

short_description: Off Screens, Into Fun -- Encourage outdoor fun and healthy habits! Our dome climber builds strength, coordination, and lifelong fitness—perfect for kids aged 3–10 to play together, indoors or out.
Fun Basketball Hoop -- Zupapa Dome Climber with Basketball, made fun again! The upgraded decagonal design includes a new backboard that adds variety to climbing and keeps play engaging.
Superior Rust Resistance -- Each steel pole is hot-dip galvanized at 450°C, with a zinc layer ≥60μm. This ensures complete rust resistance and durability in all weather conditions.

Heavy-Duty 1000LBS Capacity -- Upgraded with 5 reinforced top beams and 1.2mm thick galvanized steel, this climber supports up to 1000 lbs—multiple kids or even adults can climb, swing, or hang together safely. Our 3D assembly video makes assembling your jungle gym quick and easy.
Safe & Easy-to-Grip Handles -- All grips are made of high-density polyethylene (HDPE), ensuring a secure and comfortable hold. Ideal for young children and built for years of indoor or outdoor use.
Little Hint: Do not tighten all the bolts. Leave them loose so you can move the bars around. When you are finished you can go back and make them tight.
